definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: We will let you operate on the new machine on condition that you follow the operating rules.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你遵守操作规程，我们就让你开这台新机器。

sentences.english: Abide operation regulation, forbid peccant operation.
sentences.chinese: 遵守操作规程，严禁违章操作。

sentences.english: Strictly obey and implement sales policy and regulation.
sentences.chinese: 严格执行公司有关销售的各项政策及操作规程。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is effective to control rodent according to the operational instruction in the residential areas.
sentences.chinese: 结论按操作规程灭鼠能有效控制居民区下水道家栖鼠。

sentences.english: Main equipments and operation schedule for producing tire cord steel in Shagang are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了沙钢生产帘线钢的主要设备及工艺操作规程。

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the operating procedure for designing the randomized scheme of multi-center clinical trial.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究多中心临床试验随机化方案设计的操作规程。

sentences.english: They argued her out of violating the operating rule.
sentences.chinese: 他们说服她别违反操作规程。

sentences.english: ASTM D 4585-99, Standard Practice for Testing the Water Resistance of Coatings Using Controlled Condensation.
sentences.chinese: 用受控的冷凝机测量涂层防水性能测试的操作规程。

sentences.english: Objectie: To explore the operating procedure for designing the randomized scheme of multi-center clinical trial.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究多中心临床试验随机化方案设计的操作规程。

sentences.english: The mender recommends me to amend the legend agenda.
sentences.chinese: 修理的人建议我改正图例操作规程。

sentences.english: ASTM D 1730-03, Standard Practices for Preparation of Aluminum and Aluminum-Alloy Surfaces for Painting.
sentences.chinese: 铝及铝合金表面的涂层的准备操作规程。
